title: 96/287/EC: Commission Decision of 15 April 1996 amending the boundaries of the less-favoured areas in Sweden within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the Swedish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 15 April 1996 amending the boundaries of the less-favoured areas in Sweden within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the Swedish text is authentic) (96/287/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Community list of less-favoured areas in Sweden given in Annex I to Directive 95/498/EC is hereby supplemented by the list given in the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Sweden.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 April 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
